title: Roteflue
text: The Roteflue (also spelled "Rotefluh") is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Bernese%20Alps">Bernese Alps</a>, overlooking <a href="Lake%20Brienz">Lake Brienz</a> in the <a href="Bernese%20Oberland">Bernese Oberland</a>. It is located west of the <a href="Faulhorn">Faulhorn</a>.
